body_html:
You are right! I did not read that page carefully enough and missed where it said: "The proper components must be installed within the Individual Components tab of Visual Studio Installer (except for the VC2015 one)."
I was missing several components, so I'm installing them now.
I did notice, however, that the page indicated the use of CUDA v9.1. Is it an issue if I'm using CUDA v9.0?

body:
You are right! I did not read that page carefully enough and missed where it said: "The proper components must be installed within the Individual Components tab of Visual Studio Installer (except for the VC2015 one)." 
I was missing several components, so I'm installing them now.
I did notice, however, that the page indicated the use of CUDA v9.1. Is it an issue if I'm using CUDA v9.0?
